Text.Translation: A post has been put in quarantine
A topic has been put in quarantine
You are not allowed to attach files to a post.
The file is too big, the max allowed file size is {MaxFileSize} bytes.
You are only allowed to have attachments for {MaxAttachmentsSize} bytes. With this attachment you exceed that. The file was not attached.
The file type is not allowed.
Unknown error, files was not attached.
Your password has been changed and you will receive an e-mail with your new password shortly.
The user creation request has been canceled. Please verify your entry and try again. If the problem persists, please contact your system administrator.
The authentication provider returned an error. Please verify your entry and try again. If the problem persists, please contact your system administrator.
The user name provided is invalid. Please check the value and try again.
The password retrieval question provided is invalid. Please check the value and try again.
The password retrieval answer provided is invalid. Please check the value and try again.
The e-mail address provided is invalid. Please check the value and try again.
The password provided is invalid. Please enter a valid password value.
A user name for that e-mail address already exists. Please enter a different e-mail address.
User name already exists. Please enter a different user name.
An unknown error occurred. Please verify your entry and try again. If the problem persists, please contact your system administrator.
You are using an external account, and this is your first visit. If you're not interested in using the username the external provider has given us, this is your chance to change it.
The name is already in use, please choose another one.
The given e-mail address is not valid
The e-mail address is already in use on an existing account.
Your password is required when changing e-mail address!
The new password does not match the repeated password!
Your old password is required when changing password!
Are you sure you want to delete the '{0}' board, categories, forums, topics and posts?
Deleting the board failed, the error(s) was: {0}
A new board was created successfully!
Creating a new board failed, the error(s) was: {0}
The new access mask was created successfully
Updating the board failed, the error(s) was: {0}
Are you sure you want to delete the '{0}' category along with all forums, topics and posts?
Deleting the category failed, the error(s) was: {0}
A new category was created successfully!
Creating a new category failed, the error(s) was: {0}
Are you sure you want to delete the '{0}' access mask?
Deleting the access mask failed, the error(s) was: {0}

Data is submitted to our main site. We only register the version and time of the installation. No other data will be kept. The data is used for statistics on how many installations are running and on which versions.
The access mask was updated successfully!
Updating the access mask failed, the error(s) was: {0}
Are you sure you want to delete the '{0}' forum along with all sub-forums, topics and posts?
Deleting the forum failed, the error(s) was: {0}
A new forum was created successfully!
Creating a new forum failed, the error(s) was: {0}
Updating the forum failed, the error(s) was: {0}
A new sub-forum was created successfully!
Creating a new sub-forum failed, the error(s) was: {0}
Are you sure you want to delete the '{0}' forum along with all sub-forums, topics and posts?
Deleting the forum failed, the error(s) was: {0}
Are you sure you want to delete the '{0}' user?
Deleting the user failed, the error(s) was: {0}
A new user was created successfully!
Creating a new user failed, the error(s) was: {0}
Updating the user failed, the error(s) was: {0}
Are you sure you want to remove the user from the '{0}' group?
Deleting the membership failed, the error(s) was: {0}
Adding the user to the group failed, the error(s) was: {0}
The user has been added to the group!
Are you sure you want to delete the '{0}' group?
Deleting the group failed, the error(s) was: {0}
Creating a new group failed, the error(s) was: {0}
A new group was created successfully!
Updating the group failed, the error(s) was: {0}
Clearing all indexes will delete all indexed data, and rebuild the indexes. Depending on the number of topics and posts, this may take anywhere from seconds to hours.
Please remember to include the \{Url\} tag in the text, otherwise no activation link is included. Other tags available are: \{Email\} and \{Password\}
Please remember to include the \{Password\} tag in the text. Other tags available are: \{Email\}.
The allowed OpenAuth providers are configured in the web.config file.
Sending e-mail failed, the error was: {ErrorMessage}
E-mail address to use when sending e-mails
Name to use when sending e-mails
The e-mail has been recieved by the configured mail-server, check your inbox.
Use MVC Forum's log-on and register pages
Require e-mail validation for new accounts
Require new users to accept rules
E-mail address to use when sending mail
Allow the users to select a theme
The number of old posts to show
Maximum size of a single attachment (megabyte, 0 for unlimited)
Maximum size of all the user's attachments (megabyte, 0 for unlimited)
Show online users (might not be supported by the membership provider)
E-mail to moderators when quarantined post
You have to repeat the password.
The access mask name is required!
The sort order must be an integer!
The access mask name is required!
The sort order must be an integer!
Your search for '{Query}' did not return any results.
The forum rules has to be accepted!
Your new account has been created and you will receive an e-mail with details on how to activate the account shortly.
Din nye konto er oprettet og du vil om kort tid, modtage en e-mail med en beskrivelse af hvad du skal gøre for at aktivere din konto.
Your new account has been created and is ready to use.
Din nye konto er oprettet og klar til brug.
The username of your external account is already in use on this site. You'll have to use another external account, or register for a local account.
Brugernavnet fra din eksterne konto er allerede brugt på dette site. Du bliver nødt til at benytte en anden ekstern konto, eller registrere en lokalt konto.
Your new account has now been activated and is ready to use!
Din nye konto er nu aktiveret og er klar til brug!
We could not activate your new account!
Din nye konto kunne ikke aktiveres!
Or you can \<a href="register"\>register a new account\</a\>
Eller du kan \<a href="register"\>registrere en ny konto\</a\>
Merge failed, 2 or more topics needed for a merge
Fletning fejlede, der skal vælges 2 eller flere emner.
You do not have moderator access to the forum '{Name}'
Du har ikke moderator adgang til forummet '{Name}'
You do not have moderator access.
You can not delete the message '{Subject}'
You can not undelete the message '{Subject}'
Du kan ikke omgøre sletningen af beskeden '{Subject}'
You do not have access to the '{0}' forum
Du har ikke adgang til forummet '{0}'
You are not allowed to post in the '{0}' forum
Du har ikke adgang til at skrive beskeder i forummet '{0}'
You are not allowed to attach a file to a post
Du har ikke adgang til at vedhæfte filer til en besked
You are not allowed to edit this post
Du har ikke adgang til at redigere denne besked
You're IP address ({IPAddress}) has been banned. Please contact us for further details.
Din IP adresse ({IPAddress}) er sortlistet. Kontakt os for flere detaljer.
The e-mail address is not valid!
This message has been deleted, reason: {Reason}
The new topic '{Topic.Title}' has been posted in the forum: '{Forum.Name}'.
Det nye emne "{Topic.Title}", er blevet oprettet i forummet "{Forum.Name}".
A new post '{Post.Subject}' has been posted in a topic you follow.
Et nye indlæg "{Post.Subject}", er blevet oprettet i et emne du følger.
A post report by you have been resolved.
En indlægsrapport fra dig er blevet løst.
The post '{Post.Subject}' you reported with the reason: '{Report.Reason}' has been resolved.
Indlægget "{Post.Subject}" du rapporterede med begrundelse: "{Report.Reason}" er blevet løst.
